sections.heading: Rules
sections.text: and regulations.

sections.heading: Regulations
sections.text:
governing dispensing opticians and apprentice dispensing opticians:

Requirements for issuance of licenses and program of apprenticeship for

apprentice dispensing opticians; examination or certificate required for

issuance of license as dispensing optician; procedures for licensing; period of

validity and terms for renewal and reinstatement of license; inactivation and

reactivation of license; requirements for approval of course or provider of

course of continuing education.
